Posts.Content: leebrigs wrote: I figured I'd start the June rads thread. I've been lurking a lot on these boards (guess I'm just shy) and so here's my intro -- lumpectomy and re-excision, Stage 1, ER/PR+ and will be starting rads next week -- 27 tx plus 7 boosts. Tats and CT scan went fine but I'm anxious about the whole process. Getting burnt and fatigued is not a great way to start the summer but I'm hoping it goes uneventfully. Anyone else out there starting in June? Lee Log in to post a reply
